verses.verse: Now Solomon <WH8010> purposed <WH559> to build <WH1129> a house <WH1004> for the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and a house <WH1004> for his kingdom <WH4438>.

Behold <WH1129>, I am about to build a house <WH1004> for the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068> my God <WH430>, to dedicate <WH6942> it to him <WH6999>, and to burn before <WH6440> him incense <WH7004> of sweet <WH5561> spices <WH8548>, and for the continual showbread <WH4635>, and for the burnt-offerings <WH5930> morning <WH1242> and evening <WH6153>, on the sabbaths <WH7676>, and on the new moons <WH2320>, and on the set feasts <WH4150> of Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430>. This is an ordinance for ever <WH5769> to Israel <WH3478>.
And the house <WH1004> which I build <WH1129> is great <WH1419>; for great <WH1419> is our God <WH430> above all gods <WH430>.

But who is able <WH6113> to build <WH1129> him a house <WH1004>, seeing heaven <WH8064> and the heaven <WH8064> of heavens <WH8064> cannot contain <WH3557> him <WH1129>? who am I then, that I should build him a house <WH1004>, save only <WH518> to burn incense <WH6999> before him <WH6440>?

Now therefore send <WH7971> me a man <WH376> skilful <WH2450> to work <WH6213> in gold <WH2091>, and in silver <WH3701>, and in brass <WH5178>, and in iron <WH1270>, and in purple <WH710>, and crimson <WH3758>, and blue <WH8504>, and that knoweth how to grave <WH6605> all manner of gravings <WH6605>, to be with the skilful men <WH2450> that are with me in Judah <WH3063> and in Jerusalem <WH3389>, whom David <WH1732> my father <WH1> did provide <WH3559>.

Send <WH7971> me also cedar-trees <WH730>, <WH6086> fir-trees <WH1265>, and algum-trees <WH418>, out of Lebanon <WH3844>; for I know <WH3045> that thy servants <WH5650> know <WH3045> how to cut <WH3772> timber <WH6086> in Lebanon <WH3844>: and <WH5650>, behold, my servants shall be with thy servants <WH5650>,
even to prepare <WH3559> me timber <WH6086> in abundance <WH7230>; for the house <WH1004> which I am about to build <WH1129> shall be great <WH1419> and wonderful <WH6381>.

And <WH5414>, behold, I will give to thy servants <WH5650>, the hewers <WH2404> that cut <WH3772> timber <WH6086>, twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> measures <WH3734> of beaten <WH4347> wheat <WH2406>, and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> measures <WH3734> of barley <WH8184>, and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> baths <WH1324> of wine <WH3196>, and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> baths <WH1324> of oil <WH8081>.

And now I have sent <WH7971> a skilful <WH2450> man <WH376>, endued <WH3045> with understanding <WH998>, of Huram <WH2361> my father <WH1>'s,

the son <WH1121> of a woman <WH802> of the daughters <WH1323> of Dan <WH1835>; and his father <WH1> was a man <WH376> of Tyre <WH6876>, skilful <WH3045> to work <WH6213> in gold <WH2091>, and in silver <WH3701>, in brass <WH5178>, in iron <WH1270>, in stone <WH68>, and in timber <WH6086>, in purple <WH713>, in blue <WH8504>, and in fine linen <WH948>, and in crimson <WH3758>, also to grave <WH6605> any manner of graving <WH6603>, and to devise <WH2803> any device <WH4284>; that there may be a place <WH5414> appointed unto him with thy skilful men <WH2450>, and with the skilful men <WH2450> of my lord <WH113> David <WH1732> thy father <WH1>.
